### *A Collection of Hands-on R Notes* {style="padding-top: 0px;"}

This website is a collection of notes for R. It's updated as I see fit. These notes are primarily written for use in the tidyverse suite of packages, although I will include base R code or suggestions from other packages where appropriate.
